Nightlight::

Nightlight nodded and walked towards Vampirtron while she continued 
shooting her energy-balls. She knew that she have to find out a way 
to hold him.

"I think that a dart gun would be better!!!" suggested Nightlight



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> "Hold him" he said while getting a needle like device out of a 
cabinet

> > > > > 
> > > > >   Vampirtron: 
> > > > > 
> > > > >        He was fully aware of all that happened, hyperkeenly 
> > too. 
> > > > Time had seemed to slow for him. 
> > > > > 
> > > > >        "No more time left in the world...I need to FEED!!!" 
He 
> > > > yelled, then seemed to pass out. On instinct programming he 
> > > > transformed into robot mode, and lied there, unmoving, eyes 
shut. 
> > > > There were no more energon surges going through him, but he 
> > seemed 
> > > > quite dead. 
> > > > > 
> > > > >        That's when the hunger took over, his eyes whipped 
open, 
> > to 
> > > > reveal a new colour. His optics, which were normally light 
blue, 
> > had 
> > > > turned a frightening blood red. The colour almost illuminated 
the 
> > > > room. When Vampirtron spole, it was with a slight 
modification to 
> > his 
> > > > vocal center, his voice was deeper and almost seemed to echo. 
> > > > > 
> > > > >        "Activating Mayfair Recording," He said, in a very 
flat 
> > > > tone. Then his voice picked up emotions that weren't his 
> > own, "Ahh, 
> > > > greetings," He said in a chipper voice, "I see you have found 
my 
> > pet. 
> > > > Well, isn't this a golden opportunity? I think it is. What 
can I 
> > tell 
> > > > you about Experiment 666? Well, he has no spark for one, but 
> > > > ironically, one of the most compasionate transformers I've 
ever 
> > met. 
> > > > How does he stay alive? Well, he feeds on other transformers. 
How 
> > > > does he make this process happen? Well, if this recording has 
> > been 
> > > > activated, I think you're all going to get a personal 
> > demonstration." 
> > > > Vampirtron sat unmoving still, "End of Mayfair Recording." 
> > > > > 
> > > > >        Vampirtron sat still for a few more seconds, but 
then 
> > leaped 
> > > > up towards the nearest person, Nightlight. He opened his 
mouth 
> > wide 
> > > > in midair, and huge canine teeth extended, with little drills 
at 
> > the 
> > > > end. His claws extended and he reached out to grab her... 
> > > > >
